SEARCH
Package Figures

Class Circle

java.lang.Object
Figures.GeometricFigure
Figures.Circle
public class Circle extends GeometricFigure
Class that creates and manipulates circles. Provides methods for translation, scaling, and collision creation.

      Constructor for a circle
      Parameters:
      s - string in the format "cx cy r"
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string is invalid or the radius is negative

    • rotate

      public Circle rotate(double angle, Point center)
      Creates a new instance of the circle rotated by an angle (In the end, it does nothing)
      Specified by:
      rotate in class GeometricFigure
      Parameters:
      angle - rotation angle
      center - point around which the circle will rotate
      Returns:
